text:
Created attachment 35203
screenshot of where I entered the e-mail address

When using an e-mail address with a + in it, this is not sent correctly, resulting in a failing login.

The emailaddress used looks like myname+jmeter@gmail.com. This somehow doesn't get sent correctly.
When using e-mailaddresses without the +, the test works just fine.
